workers.goal: Make utilization tab the default landing view and add top KPIs for daily/weekly/monthly/yearly overall averages.
done_when: Dialog opens on utilization log tab by default.
Top KPI cards show fleet-wide daily/weekly/monthly/yearly average utilization.
No regression in existing live runtime polling flow.

workers.goal: Add machine grouping capability and show full-machine utilization list with group filter.
done_when: All registered machines are listed in utilization fleet table.
Group selector exists and filters fleet rows.

workers.goal: Strengthen period controls (preset + custom) and ensure DB-backed refresh for all utilization widgets/tables.
done_when: Period controls drive all utilization widgets consistently.
Changing range refreshes KPI cards, fleet table, and timeline together.
No auto-reset to unrelated snapshot/live state while in utilization tab.

workers.goal: Separate realtime vs utilization by permission and keep utilization as default for web/limited roles.
done_when: A permission/config flag controls realtime tab visibility/access.
Without permission, only utilization-focused workflow is visible.
With permission, realtime remains available and functional.

workers.goal: Refine utilization page visual hierarchy and spacing for operator-friendly scanability.
done_when: Top KPIs, period controls, and fleet list are visually separated and readable.
No overlap/crowding at common resolutions (1920x1080 and 2560x1440).
Design remains consistent with monitor app style tokens.
